ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Knowledge', NOT( Stops_me_from_doing_something__c ), NOT( Slows_me_down__c ), NOT( Reduces_confidence_in_what_I_am_doing__c ), NOT( No_impact__c ), NOT( Other_4__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least one of the checkboxes in the section "Whatâ€™s the impact on you?" must be checked.
